_schema.description: Character definitions for image generation. Claude Code populates this from your source material.
_schema.variant_pattern: Use dot notation for variants: Hero, Hero.Formal, Hero.Injured
notes: Each character needs detailed visual descriptions for consistent image generation
description_components are broken down for flexible prompt assembly
full_description is used for simpler prompts or when components aren't needed
Variants: Use dot notation (Hero.Formal, Hero.Injured) for different appearances
Each variant is a complete, standalone entry - not a partial override

ExampleHero.name: Example Hero
ExampleHero.full_description: A young adventurer with bright eyes and determination. Wears practical leather armor over simple traveling clothes. Carries a worn backpack and walking staff.

description_components.head_face: Young face with bright, curious eyes. Short brown hair, slightly tousled. Determined expression.
description_components.body_build: Average height, athletic build from travel. Good posture, confident stance.
description_components.clothing: Practical leather armor over a simple linen shirt. Brown traveling pants tucked into worn boots.
description_components.accessories: Worn leather backpack, wooden walking staff, small pouch at belt.

ExampleHero.Formal.name: Example Hero (Formal)
ExampleHero.Formal.full_description: The same young adventurer, now dressed for a formal occasion. Bright curious eyes unchanged. Wearing elegant noble attire instead of traveling gear.

description_components.head_face: Young face with bright, curious eyes. Short brown hair, neatly combed. Slightly uncomfortable formal expression.
description_components.body_build: Average height, athletic build. Standing straighter than usual, slightly stiff posture.
description_components.clothing: Fine dark blue doublet with silver embroidery. Crisp white shirt underneath. Pressed dark trousers and polished black boots.
description_components.accessories: Small ceremonial dagger at belt, silver chain necklace.

ExampleHero.Injured.name: Example Hero (Injured)
ExampleHero.Injured.full_description: The same young adventurer showing battle damage. Bright eyes now tired and pained. Leather armor torn and bloodied, visible wounds.

description_components.head_face: Young face with tired, pained eyes. Short brown hair matted with sweat and dirt. Cut above left eyebrow, bruised cheek.
description_components.body_build: Average height, athletic build. Slouched posture, favoring left side. Exhausted stance.
description_components.clothing: Leather armor torn and dented. Linen shirt visible through tears, bloodstained. Pants muddy and ripped at knee.
description_components.accessories: Backpack missing, walking staff broken and used as crutch, bandage wrapped around left arm.

ExampleMentor.name: Example Mentor
ExampleMentor.full_description: An elderly sage with kind eyes and weathered features. Long silver beard, flowing blue robes. Carries an ancient tome.

description_components.head_face: Weathered face with deep laugh lines. Kind, wise eyes. Long silver beard reaching chest level.
description_components.body_build: Tall but slightly stooped with age. Thin frame, graceful movements.
description_components.clothing: Flowing robes in deep blue with silver embroidery. Simple sandals.
description_components.accessories: Ancient leather-bound tome, crystal pendant on silver chain.
